name: Davidoff - The Master Selection - 2016
additionalNotes: Davidoff’s The Master Selection is getting a new installment, as this morning the company announced that The Master Selection 2014 will be released this Thursday, September 1. It uses a Dominican wrapper, Ecuadorian 702 binder, and Dominican fillers, including piloto ligero and visus, hybrid olor, and San Vicente ligero, visus and seco. The company calls it a medium strength blend highlighted by oak, fresh spice and leather, and notes that the cigars were rolled two years ago. The Master Selection line debuted 2017 and is based on a series of cigars that Eladio Diaz, the company’s former master blender and quality control chief, made for himself every year for his birthday.
